repnme.cdata!:
Jamaica - Trade and Financial Sector
            Adjustment Operation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
This trade and financial sector
            adjustment project is intended to improve the performance of
            exports and industry as well as strengthening the financial
            sector. More particularly this program will focus on two key
            areas. First, the remaining distortions in the trade regime
            would be eleminated by establishing a broad based and more
            uniform tarriff structure with appropriate incentives for
            export. Second, private investment and equity investment
            bias would be reduced by eliminating distortions in the
            financial markets. The project would finance imports of raw
            materials, intermediate goods, non-luxury consumer goods,
            capital equipment and spare parts. Counterpart funds would
            be used to reduce the indebtedness of the Government with
            the domestic banking system.
